title: Suspect in 6th Street murder arrested in Atlanta area
content:
Endicott McCray, the 24-year-old suspect in a shooting on 6th Street early Sunday morning that left Teqnika Marie Moultrie dead, has been arrested in the Atlanta area by U.S. Marshals.
Marshals say McCray was arrested at 9:45 a.m. on Wednesday. Further details were not immediately available.
McCray is charged with 1st degree murder for Moultrie's death
According to an affidavit, police say they believe the intended target of the shooting was McCray's brother-in-law.
This is a developing story, check back for updates.
